translations.LLaMa integration adds ability to search: LLaMa integration adds ability to search in LLaMa and render its links.
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: If you want to allow your Nextcloud users to connect to LLaMa via OAuth, create an application in LLaMa and set the ID and secret here.
translations.How to create a LLaMa OAuth app: How to create a LLaMa OAuth app
translations.Make sure you set the \"Redirect URI\" t: Make sure you set the "Redirect URI" to
translations.Put the \"Application ID\" and \"Applica: Put the "Application ID" and "Application secret" below. Your Nextcloud users will then see a "Connect to LLaMa" button in their personal settings.
translations.Client secret of your LLaMa application: Client secret of your LLaMa application

translations.Ask your administrator to configure the: Ask your administrator to configure the LLaMa integration in Nextcloud.
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Warning, everything you type in the search bar will be sent in request to LLaMa.
